Words:
CREATE TABLE Words (
    word_id     INTEGER   PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT
                          UNIQUE,
    word        TEXT (50) NOT NULL
                          UNIQUE,
    ts          TEXT (50),
    status      INTEGER   DEFAULT (1) 
                          CHECK (status >= 1 AND 
                                 status <= 3),
    data_insert TEXT (20) DEFAULT (CURRENT_DATE),
    translate   TEXT
);
Translates:
CREATE TABLE Translates (
    translate_id INTEGER   PRIMARY KEY
                           UNIQUE,
    word_id      INTEGER   REFERENCES Words (word_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    translate    TEXT (50),
    pos          TEXT (20),
    gen          TEXT (10),
    fr           INTEGER
);
Syn:
CREATE TABLE Syn (
    syn_id       INTEGER   PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT
                           UNIQUE,
    translate_id INTEGER   REFERENCES Translates (translate_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    syn          TEXT (50),
    pos          TEXT (20),
    gen          TEXT (10),
    fr           INTEGER
);
ListWords:
CREATE TABLE ListWords (
    word_id       INTEGER   NOT NULL
                            REFERENCES Words (word_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    list_name     TEXT (50) REFERENCES ListName (list_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    word          TEXT (50),
    list_id       INTEGER   REFERENCES ListName (list_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    list_words_id INTEGER   PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    translate     TEXT (50) 
);
